Casual: Prefer using bikes throughout the day, more frequently over the weekends in summer and spring for leisure activities.
Member: Prefer riding bikes on week days during commute hours (8 am / 5pm) in summer and spring.

Casual: Travel 2 times longer but less frequently than members.
Member: Travel more frequently but shorter rides (approximately half of casual riders' trip duration).

Casual: Start and end their journeys near parks, museums, along the coast and other recreational sites.
Member: Start and end their trips close to universities, residential and commercial areas.
